name: questions
label: Single Choice Set
description: Enter your questions in the single choice set.

fields.name: connecting
fields.label: Text shown when connecting to server

fields.name: deleted-message
fields.label: Message shown when content was deleted while user was active
fields.default: The content was deleted or updated. Please refresh this page to try reloading it.

fields.name: connection-error
fields.label: Message shown when there was a connection error
fields.default: There was an error connecting to the shared state server:

fields.name: preparing-student
fields.label: Text shown to student when waiting for the teacher to start the quiz
fields.default: Please wait for your teacher to start the quiz...

fields.name: preparing-teacher-no-participants
fields.label: Text shown to the teacher when the quiz has not begun and there are no participants

fields.name: preparing-teacher-participants
fields.label: Text shown when the quiz has not begun and there are participants

fields.name: preparing-teacher-instruction
fields.label: Text explaining to the teacher what to do before the quiz has started
fields.default: Press Start when all participants have joined.

fields.name: preparing-teacher-start
fields.label: Label of the "Start" button shown before the quiz has started

fields.name: current-question
fields.label: A textual representation of the current question number

fields.name: question-show-answer-button
fields.label: Label of the "Show answer" button when displaying a question (teacher)

fields.name: question-show-scores-button
fields.label: Label of the "Show scores" button when display question's answer (teacher)

fields.name: review-no-answer
fields.label: Text shown to student when the question answer is being shown, but student hasn't given an answer

fields.name: scores-title-student
fields.label: Title of the scores screen for students

fields.name: scores-not-played
fields.label: Text in score screen when student hasn't played yet
fields.default: You have not played in this quiz yet.

fields.name: scores-title-teacher
fields.label: Title of the scores screen for teachers

fields.name: scores-next-question
fields.label: Label of the "Next question" button in the scores screen

fields.name: final-score-title
fields.label: Label for the final score

fields.name: final-score-not-played
fields.label: Text in final score screen when student hasn't played
fields.default: You haven't played in this quiz!

fields.name: scores-table-place
fields.label: Label for 'Place' in the final score table

fields.name: scores-table-name
fields.label: Label for 'Name' in the (final) score table

fields.name: scores-table-score
fields.label: Label for 'Score' in the (final) score table

fields.name: final-score-play-again
fields.label: Label for the 'Play again' button in the final score screen
